code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Form(_ref){let{onSubmit}=_ref;const[formContent,setFormContents]=useState({date:"",description:"",category:"",amount:""});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormContents({...formContent,[name]:value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();onSubmit(formContent);setFormContents({date:"",description:"",category:"",amount:""});};console.log(formContent);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Date:"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",name:"date",value:formContent.date,onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"description",value:formContent.description,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"category",value:formContent.category,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Category"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"amount",value:formContent.amount,onChange:handleChange,placeholder:"Amount"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",type:"submit",children:"Add Transaction"})]});}export default Form;
